name: Fruit Jelly Mania
description:
Welcome in the fruit jelly mania the world of jelly dripping sugary magic match connecting fruit game. Fruit jelly mania is a very addictive magic match connect lines puzzle game.

Play with fresh and colorful Juicy fruit , so its yummy and super delicious frutti splash. This is a very addictive magic match connect lines puzzle game that you simply cannot miss! every kind of sugar jelly sweet is here for you.

How to play :
Connect yummy juicy fruits to solve compelling levels in this magic match puzzle adventure.

Features :
1. Connect 3 yummy juicy fruits to collect them.
2. Solve over 100 magical match levels with jelly dripping sugary fruits
3. Colorful and vivid jelly fruit bubble .
4. 3Sweet connect make jellies combos.

You're ready for this sweet fruit jelly mania magical match game now. Connect them in this fruit jelly mania adventure, so yummy and juicy !

If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As a developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at info@vimapmobi.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.
You can find me on Twitter at @alanpstern.
